pages.title: Eternals
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Eternals$() are Companions inside Vaults that can assist you in fighting against mobs by fighting themselves or providing $(#033dfc)Auras$() giving Mobs negative effects and Players positive effects.

pages.title: Creating Eternals
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Eternals$() are created through $(#033dfc)Cryo Chambers$(), which you have to fuel with $(#033dfc)Trader Cores$() by either right-clicking the $(#033dfc)Cryo Chamber$() or via hoppering/item piping. Each new Eternal will require more Trader Cores than the last one.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: To summon $(#033dfc)Eternals$() you need any of the $(#033dfc)Eternal Abilities$() unlocked as well as an alive $(#033dfc)Eternal$().$(br2)Activating the ability inside a Vault will summon an eternal based on your Ability.

pages.title: Reviving
pages.text: To revive an $(#033dfc)Eternal$(), right click a $(#033dfc)Life Scroll$() on the Eternal inside the GUI.

pages.title: Rerolling Auras
pages.text: To reroll the auras of an $(#033dfc)Eternal$(), right click an $(#033dfc)Aura Scroll$() on the Eternal inside the GUI.

pages.title: Leveling Eternals
pages.text: To Level up $(#033dfc)Eternals$() you require Eternal Exp Food, which can be either crafted or found inside the Vault$(br)Each Level allows you to upgrade the base Stats of your Eternal.
